column2: ENGLISH

You're the Captain of the Swan Knights of Dol Amroth, and though you haven't been trained to become one, you can now claim to be a Swan Knight yourself. Now you can wear the official emblem, a white swan on a blue flag, on your armor.
column3: Vous êtes le Capitaine des Chevaliers au Cygne de Dol Amroth, et bien que vous n'ayez pas été formé pour le devenir, vous pouvez dorénavant vous revendiquer comme chevalier vous-même. Vous pouvez maintenant porter l'emblème officiel, azur frappé du sceau du Cygne, sur votre armure.

column2: I'm a Swan Knight.
column3: Je suis un Chevalier au Cygne.

column2: A new Captain for the Swan Knights?
The Old Captain of the Swan Knighs has passed away, and although a temporary new Captain has been chosen, as the rightful overlord of the Swan Knights you can pick a new Captain.
The temporary Captain will be the new Captain.
The new Captain will be the son of Nobility.
The new Captain should be a Swan Knight already.
The new Swan Knight Captain
You have decided to have a son of the Nobility as the new Captain of the Swan Knights - but who shall you pick?
I'll choose one of my sons.
I'll choose one of my lord's sons.
The new Swan Knight Captain
A number of candidates from amongs the sons of the Nobility have been picked to possibly be the next Captain of the Swan Knights. Who do you pick?
[Root.SW_1.GetDynName] will be the new Captain!
I pick [Root.SW_2.GetDynName] as the Captain!
[Root.SW_3.GetDynName] is my man!
I don't like these options. Back up!
You, the Captain of the Swan Knights?
In a great honour, [From.GetTitledName] has picked you to be Captain of the Swan Knights. You can accept or refuse, but consider the reactions of your family members!
I will accept
I will decline, politely
Captain of the Swan Knights Accepted!
[From.GetDynName] has accpeted you offter, and is now the Captain of the Swan Knights.
He'll be great.
Captain of the Swan Knights Refused!
Your chosen candidate for the Captain of the Swan Knights has refused to accept the position.
Sad! I'll try that again
